sentences.en: A four-man gang carried out the robbery.
sentences.cn: 这起抢劫是一个四人团伙所为。

sentences.en: A gang taunted a disabled man.
sentences.cn: 一伙小混混嘲笑一位残疾人。

sentences.en: All the girls in my class seemed to gang up against me.
sentences.cn: 我们班的女生好像都联合起来对付我。

sentences.en: Armed gangs have hijacked lorries.
sentences.cn: 武装犯罪团伙劫持了卡车。

sentences.en: Come on over, we've got lots of the old gang here.
sentences.cn: 过来吧，好多老朋友都在这儿。

sentences.en: even the best laid plans &B{gang aft agley}.
sentences.cn: 哪怕最周密的计划也会出差错；人算不如天算。

sentences.en: He double-crossed the rest of the gang and disappeared with all the money.
sentences.cn: 他骗了其他同伙，携款潜逃了。

sentences.en: He was attacked by a gang of youths.
sentences.cn: 他遭到一帮小混混的袭击。

sentences.en: Officers had tailed the gang from London during a major undercover inquiry.
sentences.cn: 在一次重大的秘密调查行动中，警察从伦敦就盯上了那帮匪徒。

sentences.en: Several gangs were operating in the area.
sentences.cn: 有好几个犯罪团伙在这个地区活动。

sentences.en: Some investigators regarded her as the brains of the gang.
sentences.cn: 一些调查员认为她是该团伙的决策者。

sentences.en: The accused is alleged to be a member of a right-wing gang.
sentences.cn: 据称被告是某右翼组织的成员。

sentences.en: The gang extorted money from over 30 local businesses.
sentences.cn: 这帮歹徒向当地30多户商家勒索过钱财。

sentences.en: The gang finally fled with a large amount of cash and jewellery.
sentences.cn: 该团伙最后携大量现金和珠宝逃之夭夭。

sentences.en: The gang members committed dozens of armed robberies.
sentences.cn: 这个帮派的成员犯下了数十宗持械抢劫案。

sentences.en: The gang thought of hitting him too, but decided just to spit.
sentences.cn: 那伙人也想过要揍他，但最后只是啐了他一口。

sentences.en: The gang worked me over.
sentences.cn: 这伙小流氓把我痛打了一顿。

sentences.en: The language angel hanged up the gang and banged them at the angle of the triangle.
sentences.cn: 语言天使举起了一伙人并把他们猛撞到三角形的一个角上。

sentences.en: The navy resorted to the press-gang.
sentences.cn: 海军不得不让征兵队强制征兵。

sentences.en: The older children were always ganging up on the little ones.
sentences.cn: 年纪较大的孩子总会联合起来欺负小孩子

sentences.en: There are problems of urban decay and gang violence.
sentences.cn: 存在城市衰败和帮派暴力的问题。

sentences.en: various agencies ganging up to combat the use of illicit drugs.
sentences.cn: 不同的机构联合起来对抗非法药品的使用

trans.tran_cn: 帮派，团体，（盗贼等的）一帮，（工具，机械等的）一套，〈美俚〉棒球队
trans.tran_en: a group of criminals who work together
